io.spine.server.projection

Class ProjectionStorage<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.storage.AbstractStorage<I,io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord,RecordReadRequest<I>>
      • io.spine.server.storage.RecordStorage<I>
        • io.spine.server.projection.ProjectionStorage<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of stream projection IDs
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage<I,io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord,RecordReadRequest<I>>, StorageWithLifecycleFlags<I,io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord,RecordReadRequest<I>>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InMemoryProjectionStorage

    @SPI
public abstract class ProjectionStorage<I>
extends RecordStorage<I>
    The storage used by projection repositories for keeping Projections and the timestamp of the last event processed by the projection repository.

    This timestamp is used for 'catch-up' operation of the projection repositories.

      • readAllRecords

        protected java.util.Iterator<io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord> readAllRecords(EntityQuery<I> query,
                                                                                 com.google.protobuf.FieldMask fieldMask)
        Description copied from class: RecordStorage
        Obtains an iterator for reading records matching the query, and applying the passed field mask to the results.

        Returns only active entities if the query does not specify the lifecycle flags when the entity supports them (i.e. inherits EntityWithLifecycle). In order to read inactive entities, the corresponding filters must be set to the provided query.

        Specified by:
        readAllRecords in class RecordStorage<I>
        See Also:
        RecordStorage.readAll(EntityQuery, FieldMask)
